Humanities Week returned from Oct PERIOD  to  with free online and inperson events around Virginia Techs campus PERIOD

Virginia Tech mens soccer fell to No PERIOD  North Carolina Wednesday night in the first round of the ACC tournament  a loss that puts the nail in the coffin on the Hokies season PERIOD

While most of spooky seasons special events have come to pass fall is far from over with plenty of fun festivities still in store for Hokies hoping to embrace all the season has to offer PERIOD Southwest Virginia hosts events and has natural beauty for students to enjoy with family friends or 

An open letter to President Sands

Search salaries of employees from Virginia Tech and other universities dating back to  PERIOD

This Tuesday Virginia Tech mens soccer continues its season against the West Virginia Mountaineers PERIOD The Hokies look to secure a win against their Big  opponent not only to increase their record but also to exercise their defensive abilities PERIOD

While West Virginia only boasts a  record so far this season it has been known to have offensive explosions against certain opponents PERIOD Two times this year the Mountaineers have scored six goals against their opponents most notably against San Francisco when they won  PERIOD

Virginia Techs defense has gotten better with every game PERIOD With the exception of the game against Boston College in which the team allowed four goals Virginia Techs defense only gives up one to two goals per game one of the best in the conference PERIOD

The Hokies will also need to look to their offense to beat West Virginia PERIOD Although they remained scoreless in their last game against No PERIOD  Clemson the opportunities were still there PERIOD Merlin Baus had a teamhigh two shot attempts with Juan Pablo Saavedra and Andre Thomas each attempting one shot on goal PERIOD Last games loss also ended Virginia Techs fourgame ontheroad unbeaten streak PERIOD

West Virginia is  on the road this season while Virgnia Tech is  at home giving no team a clear advantage in terms of home field PERIOD The Hokies do however have one statistic that plays to their advantage history PERIOD Virginia Tech and West Virginia have matched up a total of  times PERIOD

First meeting Oct PERIOD   in Morgantown West Virgnia the Hokies took the first win between the two programs PERIOD Since that time the Hokies have won another six times and the Mountaineers have won three PERIOD

The most notable game between the two teams occurred on Sept PERIOD   when Virginia Tech won  in double overtime on Thompson Field PERIOD Last year Virginia Tech fell to the Mountaineers  in Morgantown and the Hokies look to avenge that loss PERIOD

Regardless of a win or loss this matchup will prove to be an exciting out of conference game for the Hokies PERIOD The teams offense is still flowing and its defense is tightening up significantly PERIOD

Though West Virginia is not of the same caliber as the opponents Tech has been up against this season it will prove to be a challenge and good learning experience for the team as a whole PERIOD The Hokies still are eager to win the ACC tournament and West Virginia will help prepare them for future ACC PERIOD
